title: Farming monsters doesn't give you enough exp.
body:
I'm just saying...

It used to give you more.

I noticed the change. 

Players who go for kills get more exp now. 

But they aren't any better at the game. 

In fact that is a problem because people who fight instead of pushing aren't really as concerned with winning the game.

replies.body: You are referring to jgl monsters correct? From what I understand, they lack XP so that the laners aren't able to abuse jgl camps, which is why jgl items gives bonus XP so that the jgler gains more XP if they farm jgl.
